TF037696-ECUADOR - HEALTH SERVICES
            MODERNIZATION PROJECT,TF037388-BRAZIL - PHARMACEUTICAL SECTOR STUDY,TF032437-ECUADOR - HEALTH AND NUTRITION,TF032314-ECUADOR - HOSPITAL REFORM PROJECT,TF032313-ECUADOR - HOSPITAL REFORM PROJECT,TF031670-ECUADOR  - HEALTH SECTOR PROJECT,TF029378-PHRD - TECH. ASSIST. &
            HOSPITAL REFORM PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall objective of the Health
            Services Modernization Project is to assist in expanding
            access to and improving the quality and efficiency of,
            ambulatory and hospital services, by developing new health
            care organization, financing and managerial models in
            selected provinces and municipalities. The project, in
            conjunction with the II Social Development Project - Health
            and Nutrition (FASBASE Project - Ln. 3510-EC), is expected
            to contribute to the improvement of health status of the
            poor in the medium term, particularly mothers and children
            under 5 years of age. The components include: (a)
            decentralized health systems; (b) hospital modernization;
            (c) policy development, human resources management, and
            consensus building; and (d) project administration.
